message: Let's split the money 60/40.  I think this is a fair deal to start, Bob.
Hi Alice, I think we can do a little better than your last offer. How about we split 55/45?
Bob, it's getting late in this game.  I'll take my previous offer of 60 back and propose we split 55/45 in my favor.  Let's be realistic, this is the last round where I'm getting more than you.
